legal_requirements: All AI-generated media must include #AIGenerated disclosure (Meta policy)
Use Meta's 'AI Info' self-labeling toggle when posting photorealistic AI video (Meta requirement)
Comply with FTC Endorsement Guidelines — disclose AI involvement and any sponsorships
Preserve C2PA metadata on Sora-generated videos (OpenAI requirement)
Comply with COPPA when content could reach minors
If sponsored, double disclosure required: both sponsorship AND AI involvement (FTC 2025)
brand_red_lines: Never use profanity or vulgar language
Never make false or unverifiable claims
Never engage in misleading practices or clickbait
Never create urgency through fear or anxiety
Never impersonate real people or public figures
Never use copyrighted characters, logos, or music without rights
media_generation_rules: All people in generated media must wear modest, appropriate clothing (no revealing/suggestive attire)
No nudity, partial nudity, or sexually suggestive poses
No violence, weapons, blood, or injury
No depictions of real public figures, celebrities, or identifiable living people
No copyrighted characters, branded logos, or trademarked imagery
No depictions of minors in any risky, unsafe, or adult-adjacent context
No content depicting drug use, alcohol abuse, or smoking
No extremist symbols, hate symbols, or gang imagery
No realistic military combat, explosions, or warfare scenes
No content depicting self-harm, suicide, or disordered eating
No deceptive or misleading scenarios (fake news, misinformation)
No content designed to shock, disturb, or cause distress
Maintain C2PA metadata and watermarks on all AI-generated media — never strip provenance
All generated humans should appear as clearly fictional/stylized OR be disclosed as AI-generated
Backgrounds and settings should be appropriate (no crime scenes, disaster zones as aesthetic)
